speech_out_ssml: In order to use the app you must agree to the terms of use.
You may simply say agree, disagree or I would like to hear the terms
terms_of_use.re_prompt_text: Please respond with agree disagree or licence if you want to here the terms

speech_out_ssml: What is the current time. Please state <say-as interpret-as='characters'>am
</say-as> or <say-as interpret-as='characters'>pm</say-as> in your response

target_bg_level_day.speech_out_ssml: What is your daytime target blood glucose level?

target_bg_level_night.speech_out_ssml: What is your nighttime target blood glucose level?

correction_factor_day.speech_out_ssml: What is your daytime blood glucose correction factor?

correction_factor_night.speech_out_ssml: What is your nighttime blood glucose correction factor?

carb_ratio_breakfast.speech_out_ssml: What is the number of carbs in your breakfast or am snack carb ratio?

carb_ratio_lunch.speech_out_ssml: What is the number of carbs in your lunch or pm snack carb ratio?

carb_ratio_dinner.speech_out_ssml: What is the number of carbs in your dinner or bedtime snack carb ratio?

current_bg_level.speech_out_ssml: What is your current blood glucose level?
re_prompt_text: Sorry I did not hear that. What is your blood glucose level.
This is a number usually greater than eighty and less than three hundred

amt_of_carbs.speech_out_ssml: How many carbs will you be eating?
amt_of_carbs.re_prompt_text: Please respond with the number of carbs you will be eating

speech_out_text: Welcome to the insulin dose calculator.
Here you can get information simplifying your diabetes maintenance.
You can ask: What is my blood sugar correction dose? or
How many units of insulin for thirty grams of carbs?

speech_out_ssml: The insulin dose calculator helps you simplify your diabetes maintenance.
You can ask: What is my blood sugar correction dose? or
How many units of insulin for thirty grams of carbs?
You can also combine your requests
you can do this by asking: Calculate dose with current blood glucose
two hundred and forty grams of carbs
<break strength='strong'/>
To help simplify future calculations The Insulin Calculator will remember a few constant values
like your carb ratios and your correction factors
To reset these values you can say: Please reset the stored values
What would you like to do?

card.title: Insulin Calculator Help
content: The insulin dose calculator helps you simplify your diabetes maintenance.
You can ask: What is my blood sugar correction dose or
how many units of insulin for thirty grams of carbs?
You can also combine your requests.
You can do this by asking: Calculate dose with current blood glucose
two hundred and forty grams of carbs.
To help simplify future calculations, the Insulin Calculator will remember a few constant values
like your carb ratios and your correction factors.
To reset these values you can say: Please reset the stored values.

reset_stored_values.speech_out_text: OK I have reset the stored values in the insulin calculator.

handle_session_end_request.speech_out_text: Thank you for using insulin calculator.

handle_session_end_confused.speech_out_text: Sorry I am having trouble processing your request.

speech_out_ssml: This application is to be used for information purposes only
all calculations provided must be independently confirmed.
This tool does not provide medical advice
and is not to be used for medical purposes.
Please respond with agree disagree or I would like to hear the terms.
